A wrap cardigan with a relaxed fit and raglan sleeves, made from organic cotton and knitted in a tuck stitch. The Composure Cardigan is cropped in length and fastens at the back with narrow ties.
A crew neck jumper made from organic cotton and knitted in seed stitch. It has a standard fit through the body and is finished with a narrow rib at the neckline, hem and cuffs.

An a-line panelled skirt featuring contrast topstitch detailing, made from mid-weight organic cotton denim. The skirt features side seam pockets, and is finished with a comfortable elastic waistband for a relaxed fit.

Mid-rise jeans with a curved balloon leg that tapers towards the ankle, made from a mid-weight organic cotton denim. The jeans feature elastic at the waistband, and have a relaxed fit. They have front and back pockets, and are fastened by a concealed front fly with nickel-free tacks.

A statement shirt dress made from organic cotton poplin, printed in our signature math grid inspired print. It features a frill sleeve, and a rounded collar finished in a contrast red binding. The dress has side seam pockets and fastens at the front with agoya shell buttons.

A long sleeve shirt with an a-line shape, made from organic cotton poplin. The shirt features a large round collar with ruffle detailing, and full gathered sleeves that finish in a narrow button cuff.

An oversized shirt dress made from organic cotton poplin, printed in our signature math grid inspired print. The Phoebe Dress has a gathered waistline and fastens at the front with agoya shell buttons in a concealed button placket.

It is finished with side seam pockets and fastens at the back neck with a single shell button.
